text: Placeholder node within a Loop subnet for accessing the previous iteration’s output.
instead of Compositing nodes. Though both networks still exist, the Compositing network is now designated as
. The Compositing network and its nodes will be deprecated and then removed in a future Houdini release.
The Loop Data COP is only used within a

subnetwork. Its purpose is to
provide access to the previous iteration’s output image for the Loop COP.
The first iteration will receive the image data from the 
Loop COP’s first input; all other iterations will receive the previous 
iterations' output.

COPs within the Loop subnet should use its output rather than connecting 
directly to the first subnetwork connector.
This COP should not be created on its own (it will not do anything).

title: Loop Data
summary: Placeholder node within a Loop subnet for accessing the previous iteration’s output.
